alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 17 at 2:08PM CDT until October 18 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A RED FLAG WARNING IS IN EFFECT LATE TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR SOUTHERN MOBILE AND BALDWIN COUNTIES IN ALABAMA AS WELL AS THE FAR WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH ERC AND KBDI VALUES... ...A FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT LATE TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON FOR SOUTH-CENTRAL ALABAMA DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH ERC AND KBDI VALUES... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 7 PM CDT TUESDAY FOR SOUTHERN MOBILE AND BALDWIN COUNTIES IN ALABAMA AS WELL AS THE FAR WESTERN FLORIDA PANHANDLE... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 11 AM to 7 PM CDT Tuesday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...North winds around 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
